name: A.I.M.3: War Protocol
description:
"AIM: War Protocol" continues the story that began in the game "AIM2: Clan War".
You are a mechanoid, an artificial mind that moves around the world using a hover — a combat vehicle with an anti-gravity propulsion. A huge world awaits you, full of dangers, puzzles and challenges. You communicate, fight, trade, explore the world and appropriate everything that seems useful to you.
- A full sequel to the plot of "AIM2: Clan War".
- New hovers and the best of the old ones.
- Brand new gigantic locations.
- A complete change of time of day and weather conditions affecting the game.
- Complete freedom of movement and action.
- A powerful system of equipment upgrades that allows you to improve many elements of your war machine.
- An extraordinary sci-fi story with several ending options.
- Excellent modern 3D graphics using advanced technological solutions of the UE4 engine.
- Original, atmospheric music by Grigory Semenov, composer of the first two parts of the series and "Space Rangers".
